title: Drawing, "The Wedding of Hebe and Hercules", ca. 1813
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over traces of graphite on cream laid paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Lovers sit on bed. Two putti part with club and lion skin.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "The Wedding of Hebe and Hercules", ca. 1813.
ca. 1813. Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over traces of graphite on cream laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3262.
